title: Perceptar - Virtual Reality Experience
description: A virtual reality experience exploring the concept of a 'Perceptar' - a creature that exists in the intersection of human and animal consciousness.

title: A way out of Ontological World
description: Exploring futurism, consciousness, and algorithm ethics in a philosophical context.

title: Mnemonic Movements
description: Virtual reality experience focused on movement and memory using Quest Oculus and Unity.

title: Object As Interface
description: Exploring physical computing and interaction design through tangible interfaces.

title: Virtual Windows
description: Creating virtual windows using generative AI, touch design, and projection technology.

title: Algorithm Ethic
description: Examining ethical considerations in algorithms through immersive experiences.

title: Real To Unreal
description: Bridging real and virtual worlds through interaction design and artificial intelligence.

title: Probability Space
description: Research project exploring AI and generative design in spatial contexts.

title: Simulation and Design
description: Investigating creative technology and computational design through simulation.
